page.title: 15Events_E.K. Mini_marathon
page.content: My dad has run the mini_marathon three times and has always finished it.It is 12.2 miles long.It starts at the Greenhills shops,and goes along the Greenhills Road and into the country. The runners jog along enjoying the pleasant scenery.There is a wide range of ages from 16 years of age to over 50. Some just do it for fun but others treat it like a race.A lot of people line the route cheering fathers,sons, husbands,daughters,grampas,wives etc. There are tables with cups of water for the runners.At the tables the Scouts help give out the water to the runners.If you are hungry you can get something to eat at the community centre.Every person that completes the run will get a medal but the winner gets a special medal,so does first woman and first over 50.It is enjoyable but exhausting.
